00021 /**
00022  * @file   GenoSeedTxt.h
00023  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00024  * @date   Fri Jun 30 15:13:27 PDT 2006
00025  * 
00026  * @brief Implements interface for a genotyping oracle used for
00027  * genotyping seeds in brlmm. In this case the genotype seed calls are
00028  * simply read from a text file.
00029  * 
00030  */
00031 
00032 #ifndef _GENOSEEDTXT_H_
00033 #define _GENOSEEDTXT_H_
00034 
00035 //
00036 #include "chipstream/ChipLayout.h"
00037 #include "chipstream/GenoSeed.h"
00038 //
00039 #include "util/Err.h"
00040 //
00041 #include <cstring>
00042 #include <map>
00043 #include <string>
00044 #include <vector>
00045 //
00046 
00047 /** 
00048  * @brief Implements interface for a genotyping oracle used for
00049  * genotyping seeds in brlmm. In this case the genotype seed calls are
00050  * simply read from a text file.
00051  */
00052 class GenoSeedTxt : public GenoSeed {
00053 
00054 public:
00055 
00056   /** 
00057    * Open up a text file and read the genotypes from it. The chrX
00058    * snps will be used to determine the het call rate on chrX. If
00059    * supplied.
00060    * 
00061    * @param fileName - Name of text file to read genotypes from.
00062    * @param layout - Physical description of chip and probesets.
00063    * @param chrXSnps - Which snps are on chrX.
00064    */
00065   GenoSeedTxt(const std::string& fileName, ChipLayout &layout, 
00066               std::vector<std::string> &colName,
00067               std::map<std::string,bool> &chrXSnps);
00068 
00069   /** How many chips does this object know about. */
00070   int getChipCount() { return m_ChipCount; }
00071 
00072   /** 
00073    * Get the call rates for snps for each chip.
00074    * @param callRates - Vector to be filled in with call rates for chrx snps,
00075    * one for each chip.
00076    */
00077   void getCallRates(std::vector<float> &callRates) {
00078     callRates = m_CallRates;
00079   }
00080 
00081   /** 
00082    * Get the call rates for chrX snps for each chip.
00083    * @param callRates - Vector to be filled in with call rates for chrx snps,
00084    * one for each chip.
00085    */
00086   void getHetChrXRates(std::vector<float> &hetRates) {
00087     hetRates = m_HetChrXCallRates;
00088   }
00089 
00090   virtual float getHetChrXRate(int chip) {
00091       return m_HetChrXCallRates[chip];
00092   }
00093 
00094       
00095   /** 
00096    * Get the genotype calls for a particular probeset.
00097    * @param name - name of probeset to get genotype calls for.
00098    * @return - A vector of the calls from dm algorithm.
00099    */
00100   std::vector<affx::GType> getGenoCalls(const std::string &name) {
00101     std::map<std::string, std::vector<affx::GType> >::iterator i = m_KnownCalls.find(name);
00102     if(i == m_KnownCalls.end()) {
00103       Err::errAbort("GenoSeedTxt::getGenoCalls() - Don't recognize probeset '" + name + "'");
00104     }
00105     return i->second;
00106   }
00107 
00108   /**
00109    * @brief Check if a call exists for a given probeset
00110    * @param name - name of probeset to get genotype calls for.
00111    * @return boolean result
00112    */
00113   inline bool checkGenoCallsName(const std::string &name) {
00114     return m_KnownCalls.end() != m_KnownCalls.find(name);
00115   }
00116 
00117 
00118   void fillProbesets(std::vector<std::string> &probesets) {
00119       std::map<std::string, std::vector<affx::GType> >::iterator iter;
00120       for(iter = m_KnownCalls.begin(); iter != m_KnownCalls.end(); iter++) {
00121         probesets.push_back(iter->first);
00122       }
00123   }
00124 
00125 protected:
00126 
00127   /** 
00128    * Read in the precomputed genotypes from a tab delimited file. Must
00129    * be a column for each Celfile with same header name as celfile and an row
00130    * for every snp to be analyzed. There can be extra columns and order of columns
00131    * is not important as the resulting order will be the same as the colNames
00132    * vector.
00133    * 
00134    * @param fileName - path to text file to read genotypes from.
00135    * @param colNames - Name of the columns we're expecting to find in this file.
00136    * @param gtypes - Map to store the genotypes in.
00137    */
00138   void readInPrecompGenoTypes(const std::string& fileName, 
00139                                          std::vector<std::string> &colNames,
00140                                          std::map<std::string,bool> &chrXSnps);
00141 
00142   std::vector<float> m_CallRates; ///< Call rates for each chip.
00143   std::vector<float> m_HetChrXCallRates; ///< Het call rates for chrX for each chip.
00144   std::map<std::string, std::vector<affx::GType> > m_KnownCalls; ///< Calls for each SNP.
00145   int m_ChipCount;  ///< How many chips do we have calculations for.
00146 };
00147 
00148 #endif /* _GENOSEEDTXT_H_ */
